channel.title: Error Loading?
channel.description:
heya all i have a problem trying to load up any clients of mine including Ice Realm Client, Lost Isle client V3, Halo Client etc etc... when i try to run any of these it comes up with "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundErrer: EGUI"
then says "press and key to continue"????? i know i am doing it right i have used all these clients on dif comps at home via same network it only started stuffing up once i tried to set up No-Ip and all that stuff, which has included makign the server but i dunno whats wrong, and its really annoying so if anyone could help that would be GREATLY appreciated thanks
P.S i hardly know nothing about java and stuff so if its obvious dont flame me thanks.

item.title: Error Loading?
item.dc:creator: @Camranrev Camranrev
item.description:
@Camranrev wrote:

Your lucky i can help you here

@echo off color 0a title Project Czar java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Right click on run.bat and edit delete everything and add this

Should work for you i hope it does

Read full topic
